subSubSection.paragraph:
SAUDI ARABIA • 11 ♀♀ , 3 ♂ ♂ ; Abha ;
May 2013
;
on

heading.emphasis: Distribution in the Middle East and North Africa

subSubSection.paragraph: Australasian, Eastern and Western Palaearctic, Oceanic, Oriental .

Specimens reared from
Brachycaudus tragopogonis (Kaltenbach)
are most probably refer to
Lysiphlebus volkli Tomanović & Kavallieratos, 2018
.
